name: Order Cancellation Requests
description: [Customers are asking for help cancelling their orders.]

name: Order Modification Requests
description: [Customers need assistance modifying their orders, such as adding, removing, or swapping items.]

name: [Order Modification]
description: Questions related to changing, updating, or correcting an existing order.

name: [Product Addition]
description: Questions about adding a product to an existing order.

name: [Product Deletion]
description: Questions concerning the removal of a product from an existing order.

name: [Shipping Address Change]
description: Questions related to updating or correcting the shipping address for an order.

name: Address Modification
description: [Customers are seeking help with updating or correcting their delivery or shipping addresses.]

name: Cancellation Fee Inquiry
description: [Customers want to know about the fees associated with canceling their contracts or the early termination penalties.]

name: Invoice Retrieval
description: [Customers need assistance locating or viewing their invoices, often from a specific person or with a specific invoice number.]

name: Locating Specific Invoices
description: [Customers are trying to find a particular invoice, usually identified by a number.]

name: Locating Invoices from a Person/Company
description: [Customers are trying to find invoices related to a specific person or company.]

name: Checking Invoices
description: [Customers want to view or check their invoices, often without specifying a particular one.]

name: Payment Method Inquiries
description: [Customers are asking about the accepted payment methods.]

name: [Payment Method Inquiry]
description: [Customers are asking about the available payment methods or how to check them.]

name: [Refund Policy Inquiry]
description: [Customers are asking about the refund policy, including how long refunds take and under what circumstances refunds are allowed.]

name: Refund Policy Inquiries
description: Customers are asking for help or clarification regarding the company's refund policy, including timeframes and eligibility criteria.

name: Customer Complaints
description: Customers are expressing dissatisfaction with the company's products or services and seeking assistance in filing complaints or lodging claims.

name: Customer Support Contact Information
description: Customers are inquiring about how to get in touch with customer support, including phone numbers, email addresses, and operating hours.

name: Inquiry about Customer Service Availability
description: [Customers are asking about the hours or times they can reach customer service.]

name: Request for Assistance in Contacting Customer Service
description: [Customers need help in getting in touch with customer service, either through phone or email.]

name: Request for Assistance in Speaking with Customer Service
description: [Customers need help in communicating or speaking with customer service representatives.]

name: Inquiry about Free Customer Service Contact Information
description: [Customers are asking if there is a free phone number or email address to contact customer service.]

name: Request for General Assistance with Customer Service
description: [Customers are asking for general help or assistance related to customer service.]

name: Inquiry about Contacting a Live Agent
description: [Customers want to speak with a live customer service agent instead of dealing with a bot or automated system.]

name: Inquiry about Contacting a Human Agent
description: [Customers specifically want to speak with a human agent, not a bot or automated system.]

name: Request for Assistance in Chatting with Customer Service
description: [Customers need help in starting a chat or communication session with customer service.]

name: Inquiry about Contacting an Operator
description: [Customers are asking how to contact an operator or customer service representative.]

name: Inquiry about Contacting an Assistant
description: [Customers are asking how to contact a customer service assistant.]

name: Requests for Human Assistance
description: [Customers express a desire to speak with a human agent or operator.]

name: Account Creation Inquiries
description: [Customers ask about creating or opening new accounts, including various types and categories.]

name: Account Management Questions
description: [Customers seek help with managing their existing accounts, such as upgrading, downgrading, or closing them.]

name: Account Deletion Inquiries
description: Questions regarding the deletion or cancellation of accounts, including premium, standard, gold, platinum, and freemium accounts, as well as questions about account removal and termination.

name: Shipping Inquiries
description: Customers asking about shipping methods, delivery options, and whether the company ships to specific cities or countries.

name: Shipping Method Inquiry
description: [Customers asking about the available shipping methods or how to check them.]

name: Order Placement Inquiry
description: [Customers asking if they can place an order from a specific city or country.]

name: Delivery Information Inquiry
description: [Customers asking about delivery to a specific city or country, or general delivery information.]

name: Problems with Shipment Options
description: [Customers expressing frustration or problems with the shipment options.]

name: Delivery Time Inquiries
description: Customers are asking for help or information regarding when their order or package is going to arrive.

name: Account Modification Requests
description: Customers are seeking assistance to edit, correct, or update their personal information or account details.

name: Account Information Modification
description: Account holders seeking assistance in modifying their account details.

name: Invoice Download Assistance
description: Customers requesting help to download their invoices or bills.

name: Refund Requests
description: Individuals inquiring about or requesting refunds for their purchases.

name: [Requesting Refunds]
description: Customers are asking for help or guidance on how to request a refund for a purchase.

name: [Requesting Rebates]
description: Customers are seeking assistance in requesting rebates for a purchase.

name: [Subscribing to Newsletters]
description: Customers are asking about signing up for a company newsletter or need help subscribing.

name: [Unsubscribing from Newsletters]
description: Customers are trying to unsubscribe from a company newsletter and need assistance.

name: Newsletter Subscription Inquiries
description: Subscribing to or unsubscribing from the company newsletter.

name: Payment Issues
description: Questions related to making payments, reporting payment errors, and solving payment issues.

name: Ordering Assistance
description: Customers need help with placing orders or buying products.

name: Purchase Inquiries
description: [Customers seeking help with purchasing or ordering items.]

name: Account Recovery Inquiries
description: [Customers having trouble recovering their account access keys or PINs.]

name: Forgotten PIN/Password Recovery
description: [Customers are asking for help in recovering or resetting their PIN or password.]

name: Sign-up Problems
description: [Customers are experiencing issues during the sign-up process and need assistance.]

name: Sign-up Error Reporting
description: [Customers are seeking help to report various issues related to signing up for an account or service.]

name: Leaving Feedback or Reviews
description: [Customers are inquiring about the process of leaving feedback or writing reviews for products or services.]

name: Shipping Address Issues
description: [Customers are experiencing problems related to entering or setting up their shipping addresses.]

name: [Delivery Address Setup]
description: Customers seeking help with setting up or entering a new delivery address.

name: [Delivery Address Troubleshooting]
description: Customers experiencing issues with their current delivery address, such as invalid or non-submittable addresses.

name: [Account Management]
description: Customers inquiring about changing their account type or switching to a different account.

name: Account Changes
description: Users are seeking assistance with changing or switching their accounts to a different type or category.

name: Account Usage
description: Users need help using specific features or functions of their accounts, including standard, premium, freemium, and gold profiles.

name: Order Status Inquiries
description: Users want to know the current status of their orders, including delivery times and locations, and need assistance accessing this information.

name: Refund Inquiries
description: [Customers asking about the status of their refunds or compensation.]

name: Miscellaneous Inquiries
description: [Questions that don't fit into the other categories, such as issues with tracking orders or reimbursements.]
